meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny, folks! I'm here to give you the lowdown on the Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Complete Edition for Nintendo Switch. Now, I know what you're thinking... "Another critic going all gaga over CD Projekt Red's masterpiece?" And to that, I say... guilty as charged!

But let me tell you, this game is the real deal. I mean, who wouldn't want to explore a vast open world, slay some monsters, and make some questionable life choices in the midst of an epic fantasy adventure? It's like the gaming equivalent of a Netflix binge-fest, but with swords and sorcery instead of rom-coms.

Now, I know some of you are thinking, "But what about the graphics?" Well, let me tell you, Saber Interactive did an impressive job of trimming the fat (or should I say, trimming the Geralt?) to get this game running smoothly on the Switch. And trust me, it's still a stunning visual experience.

Of course, not everyone agrees. Our friend over at COGconnected gave it a less-than-stellar 69 out of 100. Now, don't get me wrong, I respect their opinion, but come on, folks! This is the Witcher 3 we're talking about! It's like saying the Mona Lisa is only "okay" because it doesn't have enough Instagram likes.

In all seriousness, this game is a must-play for anyone who loves RPGs, dark fantasy, or just good storytelling in general. And if you don't believe me, just check out what DarkStation had to say: "As a landmark title that other games have trouble matching even now... there's no doubt about the quality of the game." Yeah, I think they're onto something there!

So, what are you waiting for? Grab your Switch and get ready to embark on an epic adventure with Geralt of Rivia! (And don't worry, I won't judge you if you choose to play it in handheld mode... we've all been there, right?)
